name: ALONE (itch) (ALONE the game)
description:
A downloadable game for Windows Explore the unknown in this gravity changing experience. 

Play as a tiny quadruped robot that has been off for many years that reboots in an unknown empty place which must be explored to discover where you are and what happened there. Solve complex gravity puzzles,  move and interact with the world in a way that you have never done before.

Interact with gravity generators to change how gravities workForget "ceiling",  "floor" and "wall" meanings
